DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the influence of the type of feeding in the first year of life on the behavior and health-related quality of life at 6-8 years of age.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of the Health Related Quality of Life and Disease Prevalence of Children From Spain at 6-8 Years of Age Who Participated in a Qualifying Infant Formula Study at Birth
DOC.criteria: Father, mother or legal representative of a child who was included in the qualifying study Child 6 8 years of age Written informed consent of the father, mother or legal representative
